title: THE ULTIMATE TRACTOR TIRE GUIDE: TREAD PATTERN OPTIONS!

tasks.task: Plan vs Implement Tire Tread Pattern Choices
subtasks: Evaluated five tractor tire tread patterns (R1, R4, R3, HDAP, Carlisle VersaTurf).
Discussed applications (lawns, snow/ice, paved surfaces, dirt/mud).
Ranked tread patterns for each application.
Covered side-to-side stability options (dual wheels, adapters).
